dct_title_s: Map of the hill country of Ceylon showing the positions of the principal coffee estates, &c
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale 1:190 080. scale of 3 miles to an in. Date is estimated. Front of cover carries imprint of Letts Son & Co.; label for Mason & Payne pasted inside cover. Dissected and laid on linen. Dimensions: 83 x 62 centimeters
